SearchTimeSlot.description: This task resource is used to retrieve available time slots. One of this available time slot is after used to create or reschedule an appointment

id.description: Unique identifier of the search time slot request

href.description: Reference to access the search time slot resource

searchDate.description: Date when the search time slot is performed

searchResult.description: Result of the search time slot (success or fail for example)

relatedParty.description: RelatedParty reference. A related party defines party or party role linked to a specific entity.

relatedPlace.description: Related place defines (by reference or value) the place where the appointment will take place.
